thread.title: Lottie Moss flaunts her pert derriere in a skimpy thong

author: Ekin Karasin
title: Lottie Moss flaunts her pert derriere in a skimpy thong

organizations.name: office trance caged heels black nubuck now
public desire anina caged strap heeled sandals

text:
She's a rising star in the model industry who's keen to step out of the shadow of her iconic half-sister Kate Moss.
And Lottie Moss proved just how she has captivated the fashion world, as she showed off her pert behind in a skimpy thong.
Sharing a steamy Instagram snap on Saturday, the 19-year-old blonde beauty had no qualms about stripping off.
Scroll down for video
Cheeky! Lottie Moss, 19, proved showed off her pert behind in a skimpy thong in a steamy Instagram snap on Saturday
Angling her body to best show off her bum, Lottie snapped the selfie over her shoulder. She wore her golden hair in a loose, straight style in the shot, which she captioned simply: 'A**'.
And continuing her snap-happy streak, Lottie recently posted a snap from the same yoga retreat where Kate Moss had a meltdown.
Kate was infamously led off an easyJet flight after branding the pilot a 'basic b****' following a trip to the LifeCo Clinic spa in Bodrum, Turkey.
And a year and a half later, Lottie sported a much more relaxed demeanour as she posed for a meditating Instagram snap at the same detox resort.
The rising model flaunted her cleavage and tiny midriff in a minuscule, plunging Nicce sports bra as she channelled her inner zen.
Looking glam: She's a rising star in the model industry who's keen to step out of the shadow of her iconic half-sister Kate Moss
Step out in style like Lottie in her Office sandals £48 Office Trance Caged Heels Black Nubuck
Now sold out - click to shop the current range
Buy now
Her older sister might be Kate Moss but Lottie is making her own mark on the fashion world!
Lottie's individual dress sense is admired by many, with this latest outfit paying homage to her cool style.
Just like her older sister, Lottie is never too far away from a leather jacket - got to love those rock 'n' vibes - which she's teamed here with an LBD and some statement caged heels.
Lottie has showcased a savvy bit of styling with this look, as choosing an eye-catching pair of heels means you can leave the rest of your outfit fuss-free.
Missing some from your own collection? Lottie's 'Trance' pair by Office have now sold out but you can get the look with our top picks below from Missguided, Public Desire and PrettyLittleThing!

At peace: Lottie Moss, 19, flaunted her tiny midriff in a skimpy sports bra as she channelled her inner zen at LifeCo Clinic spa in Bodrum, Turkey on Thursday - less than two years after her sister Kate hit headlines following a trip there
The tiny athletic number bared her flawless decolletage and flashed a peek of her swallow inkings.
Lottie - who is currently dating Made In Chelsea's Alex Mytton, 25 - showed off her impossibly flat stomach as she sat upright for the peaceful pose.
Her legs were clad in funky Tommy Hilfiger leggings, while she wound her blonde locks up into a practical bun.
'Can't believe tomorrow is my last day at the @thelifeco retreat!,' she cited her whereabouts in the snap.
In trouble: Lottie's supermodel sister Kate, 43, was infamously led off an easyjet flight for branding the pilot a 'basic b****' following a trip to the same retreat in June of 2015
Continuing on, Lottie revealed: 'Had the most amazing time, feeling relaxed and happy, ready to get back to reality and continue healthy eating with all the amazing facts about raw foods I have learnt here.'
And while the up and coming star's famous older sister Kate Moss, 43, also enjoyed a relaxing time at the retreat in June of 2015, things took a turn for the worse during her flight back to London.
According to fellow passengers at the time, the Vogue favourite called the pilot of her flight a 'basic b****' as she was led off the plane after drinking vodka she pulled from her cabin luggage.
Meltdown: The Vogue favourite was reportedly escorted from the plane by police at Luton Airport after becoming 'disruptive', causing the pilot to phone ahead and ask officers to meet the flight
Off the hook: No arrests were made but witnesses said Moss and another passenger from the flight were spoken to by officers at the airport (Pictured with Lottie in 2014 before the incident)
Basic b**** is a US slang term for a woman whose behaviour is unoriginal or clichéd.
She was reportedly escorted from the plane by police at Luton Airport after becoming 'disruptive', causing the pilot to phone ahead and ask officers to meet the flight.
However, no arrests were made but witnesses said Moss and another passenger from the flight were spoken to by officers at the airport.
Moss, who has worked as a top model for more than 27 years, was in Turkey with friends to celebrate her actress pal Sadie Frost's 50th birthday.
Meanwhile, Lottie has been treating her 96,000 Instagram followers to a peek of her glamorous life and last week shared a snap of her model stats in very daring lingerie.
Hottie Lottie: The up and coming star has been treating her 96,000 Instagram followers to a peek of her glamorous life and last week shared a snap of her model stats in daring lingerie
She also shared a snap of herself elegantly sipping on a cocktail inside Bunga Bunga last week which received over 3,000 likes.
Lottie was not joined by her boyfriend Alex Mytton, who she has been dating since October last year.
The model has been linked to several very different suitors prior to her relationship with Alex - having enjoyed lunch in June with pop star Conor Maynard, and flirting with Geordie Shore star Ricci Guarnaccio on Twitter.
Lottie and Made In Chelsea star Alex met through her ex-boyfriend Sam - who mingles in the same set as the brunette hunk and his reality star pals.
Glam life: The blonde bombshell - who is currently dating Made In Chelsea's Alex Mytton, 25 - also shares a snap of her elegantly sipping on a cocktail last week
